headline: KKR-Bain Brawl Worth $4 Billion Shows Japan Private Equity Boom

headline: KKR to Present at the Goldman Sachs 2024 US Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, November 21, 2024--KKR & Co. Inc. (NYSE: KKR) announced today that Scott C. Nuttall, Co-Chief Executive Officer, will present at the Goldman Sachs 2024 US Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, December 10, 2024 at 8:00AM ET.

headline: KKR: $370 million growth investment in Lighthouse
summary: KKR announces a $370 million growth investment in Lighthouse, a business intelligence platform specialized in the travel and hospitality industry. The investment will support Lighthouse in its mission...

headline: Lighthouse Announces $370 Million Series C Investment Led by KKR to Accelerate Platform Innovation and Growth
summary: LONDON, November 21, 2024--Lighthouse, the leading commercial intelligence platform for the travel & hospitality industry, today announced an approximately $370 million growth investment led by global investment firm, KKR. This investment accelerates Lighthouse's mission to reimagine commercial strategy for the $15 billion travel & hospitality technology market.
